mapper.insert: insert into Sangpum (sangCode, price, sangName, typeOne, typeTwo, typeThree, remStock) values (#{sangCode}, #{price}, #{sangName}, #{typeOne}, #{typeTwo}, #{typeThree}, #{remStock})
mapper.update: update Sangpum set price = #{price}, sangName = #{sangName}, typeOne = #{typeOne}, typeTwo = #{typeTwo}, typeThree = #{typeThree}, remStock = #{remStock}, saleRat = #{saleRat} where sangCode = #{sangCode}
mapper.insert: insert into SangCodeSpec (sangSize, sangColor, sangCode, remStock) values (#{sangSize}, #{sangColor}, #{sangCode}, #{remStock})
mapper.update: update SangCodeSpec set sangSize = #{sangSize}, sangColor = #{sangColor}, remStock = #{remStock} where sangCode = #{sangCode}
mapper.select: select sangColor from SangCodeSpec where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select sangSize from SangCodeSpec where sangCode = #{sangCode} and sangColor = #{sangColor}
select rating from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select saleRat from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select remStock from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
SELECT * FROM Sangpum WHERE sangCode LIKE #{sangCode} order by #{orby}
